overview: A player on a soccer team, where everyone matches together just perfectly, has fallen out of a championship tournament due to illness; which leads to a big problem:  who would be the perfect man to replace him?  Werner Fehling appears to be the perfect replacement for the sick man.  The problem is, he's a bitter rival of the goalkeeper, Jupp Jaeger.  Both men love the same girl, Grete Gabler.  Grete is the daughter of a senior member of the sports club, which is why she feels doubly under pressure not to do anything to jeopardize the success of the team.
title: The Big Game
